text: in the distance Mosul a city in waiting
for deliverance from a brutal regime
it's the last bastion of is in Iraq but
for how much longer as the net closes on
so-called Islamic state the risks are
increasing for those trapped down below
in Mosul there's the danger of coalition
airstrikes is could try to use the local
population as human shears and if and
when Iraqi forces make it inside the
city they could be caught in the
crossfire here's what is wants you to
see from inside Mosul its latest
propaganda video paints a picture of
normality
the message is all's well anyone daring
to say otherwise could be beheaded thank
God everything is fine says this man
it's peaceful here the TV channels are
lying lying lying lying but some in
Mosul are challenging the extremists
this video from one activist Network
shows a recent attack on an is vehicle
we made contact with the network's
founder outside the city for his own
safety we can't identify him we are
divided into eight groups each has his
own plan and targets to attack some will
destroy communications equipment some
will target is personnel we have assault
rifles and rocket-propelled grenades but
we can't rise up until the security
services get to Mosul or is we'll take
revenge
victory over the extremists can look
like this a year ago they were driven
from Abu Muhammad village by airstrikes
and the Peshmerga troops from Iraq
autonomous Kurdish region but this area
is cleared yes they took us to see what
is may have in store when the battle
comes to Mosul here a homemade chemical
weapon chlorine gas attached to an
improvised mortar crude but potentially
lethal the fuses have already been
removed how many of these did you find
24 just in this village some are fleeing
areas near Mosul as troops advance there
could be many more to follow if they can
find a way but Kurdish sources told us
is executed 15 civilians in one village
yesterday just for trying to escape
Orla Garan BBC news east of mosul
